home.subtitle: Software Engineer
home.about_text: Software developer with solid experience in frontend and backend technologies, specializing in high-impact projects within investment banks and startups.

experiences.btgpactual_description: Currently, I work as a software engineer on the Family Office technology team at BTG Pactual, the largest investment bank in Latin America. I contribute to the development of scalable and efficient solutions that automate and optimize key processes such as asset and account consolidation, investment performance calculations, and customized client reporting.
experiences.vlepo_description: I worked as a front-end developer at Vlepo, a web-based product pricing platform designed for industries and retail companies. The platform aimed to simplify and automate the pricing process, helping businesses make data-driven decisions and improve profitability.
